/* * In the SQL request the "q" param is used entirely to match result in database. * In this way if string:"(ref : #ref_pattern#)" is displayed on the return list, * they are no return values just because string:"(ref : #ref_pattern#)" * is not write in the name field of the product. * So the ref pattern will be cut for the search request. */
// Excluding downloadable products from packs because download from pack is not supported
// Excluding downloadable products from packs because download from pack is not supported
